title: Make a support that can scale with ad <3
body: Plx it used to be gp could with his e.

replies.body: Poppy could be a viable pick against things like {{champion:89}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:111}}
poppy is also pretty good since zac is meta right now

Let the game be decided by the bot support building armor or not.

Enemy support builds armor: chance to win ~20%
Enemy support doesn't build armor: chance to win ~40%
Camille and Illaoi have situationally worked in the past. I've seen some Lees but not seen them do great in laning phase. After it's been mixed results.

I think Pantheon support is still a thing.

I used to play with a Thresh support and he would take all the kills while I got all the farm. Then we would both build adc items and our team would have two adc's XD
